page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE : QUESTIONAIRE.
page.content: In the questionaire the following questions were asked: {Name of family.} {Address.} {What kind of housing?}Clearly in answer to this question we got a large number of replies in the categories of detached farmhouses,cottages,bungalows and modern houses,emphasising the comparative prosperity of the area. {How many in family and age of} {individuals?}The small nuclear family of parents and two/three children was clearly the most common but elderly couples or elderly single people are also common. {How many cars owned by family?}1 or 2 in almost equal proportions,showing the absolute necessity of private transport in the "D Block". {Occupation of head of household?} Mainly farming/white coll/profession.
